2074.subject: MAE
2074.course_title_long: Tech as a tool for Creativity
2074.descrlong: Participants explore current technologies and coming trends. "Technology" in this course is more than computers and digital media. Participants also explore the issues created by these technologies. They look at tools that will help them use the potential of technology to support teaching and learning, and to develop thoughtful and powerful implementations of technologies in whatever educational setting they work. Meets the Level 2 credentialing requirements of the California Commission on Teacher Credentialing. (Offered every semester online; offered summer session face-to-face.)
